Text: logan-xart  you are sooo cool, you don't at all sound like a spotty 14yr old , thanks for your sage advice,I didn't know that they still used film to shoot movies( but then I'm not cool like you). thanks for all the amazing swearing too, you are so creative...bag of dicks for breakfast... just amazing.  please tell us more

column5: but don't let that stop you from watching it. :)"
